comments:
Build ID: TPTP-4.4.0-200703270100C, TPTP-4.4.0-200704020100

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Run Thread Analysis on Java2Demo
2. Switch to Profiling Perspective
3. Try to open the Thread Statistics view


More information:
In most cases the Thread Statistics view can not be displayed because of ConcurrentModificationException. This failure occurs on PCs with CPU_count >=2. It was exersiced on 2003 and XP. I could not reproduce this on PCs with CPU_count = 1
Here is a typical trace:

Created an attachment (id=63159)
Proposed fix

Attached is solution to prevent ConcurrentModificationException. The exception is thrown when at the same time list is iterated and modified. The list is iterated on UI refresh events, and concurrently it is modified by loaders - new elements are added (e.g. thread events).
The solution is in replacing iterators by direct indexing elements in the list.

There are two places caused these exception and according to the error trace log:
 in org.eclipse.tptp.trace.jvmti.client
 and org.eclipse.hyades.trace.views

Eugene, can you please review and apply the patch when appropriate?
Eugene, Pls apply the patch into the head.
